greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicative with a(p^2) = 1, a(p^3) = -2 and a(p^e) = 0 when e = 1 or e > 3.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: (PARI) A300828(n) = { if(1==n, return(1)); my(val=1, v=factor(n), d=matsize(v)[1]); for(i=1,d, if(v[i,2] < 2 || v[i,2] > 3, return(0)); if (v[i,2] == 3, val *= -2)); return(val); }; \\ _R. J. Mathar_, _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 21 2018
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 21 2018
